name: Jynx
author: sowsow
flavor_text: It sways its hips to a rhythm all its own. The precise movements of Jynx living in Alola are truly wonderful.

abilities.name: Ominous Posture
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Attract Smack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
